#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MP make_pair
#define ll long long
ll inverse(long long int a)
{
	long long  pow = MOD - 2;
	long long act = a , res = 1;
	while( pow )
	{
		if(pow&1)
		{
			res *= act;
			res %= MOD;
		}
		act *= act;
		act %= MOD;
		pow >>= 1;
	}
	return res;
}
int a[1000006];
long long fact[1000006];
long long inversion[1000006];
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	//t=1;
	fact[0]=fact[1]=1;
	for(int i=2;i<=100005;i++)
	{
		fact[i]=(i*fact[i-1]);
		if(fact[i]>=MOD)
			fact[i]%=MOD;

	}
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,k;
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		int zero=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{

			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
			if(!a[i])
				zero++;
		}
		n-=zero;
		long long ans=0,temp;
		int minn=min(n+1,k+1);
		for(int i=0;i<minn;i++)
		{
			if(zero || (k+i)%2==0)
			{
				temp = fact[n];
				temp *= inverse(fact[i]);
				temp %= MOD;
				temp *= inverse(fact[n-i]);
				temp %= MOD;
				ans = (ans+temp)%MOD;
			}

		} 
		
		
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
}
